channel.title: How can I mute notification when alert status goes from TRIGGERED to OK
channel.description: I configured an alert to watch failed payment in every 15 minutes and set at most every 15 minutes. When failed payment happened, we received an alert, that is we want, but 15 minutes later we received the second alert caused by TRIGGERED to OK. For non-technical personnel, the second alert is incomprehensible So, how can I mute the second alert and maybe my alert settings is wrong

item.title: How can I mute notification when alert status goes from TRIGGERED to OK

item.description:
